thread.title: A$AP Rocky Was Peak Menswear at Raf Simons' Calvin Klein Show
thread.title_full: A$AP Rocky Was Peak Menswear at Raf Simons' Calvin Klein Show

title: A$AP Rocky Was Peak Menswear at Raf Simons' Calvin Klein Show
text:
A$AP Rocky Was Peak Menswear at Raf Simons' Calvin Klein Show By Twitter The three-piece guide to dressing in 2017 
If you want to know the state of #menswear in 2017, you could do worse than to look at this picture of A$AP Rocky leaving the Calvin Klein show today in New York City. 
The 28-year-old was wearing the holy trifecta of what's cool right now: a colorful, oversized puffer jacket, a high-zip funnel sweatshirt, and a cross body bag. This image should be in the goddamned Smithsonian with a plaque saying "2017 Style" under it. 
Don't believe us? We've already championed the statement puffer , the high-zip sweater , and the cross body bag , but when you wear them all together, well, you get a trio made in style heaven. Add the Balenciaga logo to it and we're basically in fashion nirvana. 
You, of course, don't need to wear it all at once â€” there's nothing wrong with slowly teasing out this season's coolest pieces over the course of a few days. But it's nice to know if you want to go whole hog, it doesn't look bad. Up Next: A$AP Rocky On a Boat
